#Question 1
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(CodeClanData)
```
```{r}
drinks_content
view(drinks_content)
```

#Question 2
```{r}
full_drinks_content <- na.omit(drinks_content)
select(full_drinks_content, Beverage_category, Beverage, Beverage_prep, Calories)
```
#Question 3
```{r}
mutate(full_drinks_content, calorie_diff = Calories - 135) 
```
#Question 4 
```{r}
drinks_grouped <- group_by(full_drinks_content, Beverage_category)
summarise(drinks_grouped, mean(Calories))
```

#Question 5
```{r}
drinks_grouped <- group_by(full_drinks_content, Beverage_prep)
summarise(drinks_grouped, mean(Calories))
```
